scripts.build: npm install && eslint ./client/scripts/*.js && eslint ./app.js && mkdir public && browserify ./client/scripts/main.js > ./public/main.js && babili ./public/main.js > ./public/main.min.js && lessc --clean-css ./client/styles/style.less ./public/style.min.css && cp client/index.html public
scripts.debug: npm install && eslint ./client/scripts/*.js && mkdir public && browserify ./client/scripts/main.js > ./public/main.js && lessc ./client/styles/style.less ./public/style.min.css && cp client/index.html public
